instructions: What was the main topic of conversation during the visit?
Have there been any changes to prescribed medications, routines for taking medications, or new unmanageable side effects?
Is there a friend or family member that helps this patient take medications, get to appointments and overall provide emotional support?
Is there a specific clinical goal like medication adherence, calling the triage line before going to the hospital, or attending PCP visits that the patient is working on?
Does the patient have a crisis plan in place in case they are contemplating suicide?
How did you use your lived experience to help relate to the challenge that the patient is having today?
